Row.Text: "The only thing we have to fear is fear itself."

[ICON_District] Commercial Hubs and their buildings provide +3 [ICON_Production] Production and -3 [ICON_Gold] Gold to the city. [ICON_Food] Farms provide -1 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Production] Production, and +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold. +0.5 [ICON_Production] Production per [ICON_Citizen] Population in all cities.
"我们唯一需要恐惧的，就是恐惧本身。"
[ICON_District] 商业中心及其建筑提供+3 [ICON_Production] 生产力和-3 [ICON_Gold] 金币。农场提供-1 [ICON_Food] 粮食、+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力和+3 [ICON_Gold] 金币。每个 [ICON_Citizen] 人口+0.5 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
